name: The Hearts of War Avert 2: Furies' Vengeance
name_original: The Hearts of War Avert 2: Furies' Vengeance
description:
Ludum Dare 41: Combine 2 Incompatible Genres

Introducing the Visual Novel RTS.

You only thought RTS games were for guys, until 3 girls in school challenge you to a game of War Avert 2: Uri's Vengeance.
Will you win their heart?

Lillian Starshow - Foreigner himedere-lite. She plays as the Allies.
Rina Tatsuki - Tech hating tsundere. She plays as the Ruskies.
Yara Markov - Bookworm dandere and knife-wielding yandere. She plays as the Furies.

(Parodies Red Alert 2 RTS, Katawa Shoujo, Fate/Stay Night, and Doki Doki Literature Club VNs)
